title: An Introduction to vectors: coplanar concurrent forces
creator_credit: United States. Office of Education and Loucks and Norling Studios
brief_description: Explains the meaning of scalar and vector quantities; how to add scalars and vectors; methods of vector composition and vector resolution; relationship between vector composition and vector resolution; and how vectors may be used to solve engineering problems.
